participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: empathetic and nurturing, enjoys helping others and sharing her love for music.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: adventurous and carefree, eager to experience life and enjoy time with friends.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out my parents' home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work a part-time job at burger king.
